LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.label: Goblin
LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.description: The draenei (meaning Exiled Ones in their own tongue) are a faction of uncorrupted eredar who fled their homeworld of Argus to escape the corruption of the demonic Burning Legion.
LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.WoW_Goblin.tools.3.label: head
